alert.note: Alert for Benton; Jasper; Newton (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 9:23PM EST until January 19 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST /1 PM EST/ FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Highest amounts south of Interstate-88. * WHERE...Portions of central, east central, north central and northeast Illinois and northwest Indiana. * WHEN...From 6 PM CST this evening to noon CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous travel conditions. Areas of blowing and drifting snow also develop late tonight and persist through Friday morning. This will significantly reduce visibility and result in snow covered roads, especially in open areas. The hazardous conditions likely impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Scattered snow showers develop Friday afternoon which could result in slippery travel conditions during the afternoon commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Illinois, the latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com. In Indiana, the latest road conditions for Indiana are available by calling 1-800-261-7623.
